Method Detail

normalise

public static java.lang.String normalise(java.lang.String str)
Helper method that normalises from the given string, inserting a '_' in all areas of whitespace. Also makes everything lowercase. "My Room" -> "my_room"

Parameters:
str - the String to normalise
Returns:
the normalised string
